titlealts.searchtitle: NHS Business Definition: Clinical Commissioning Group Eligibility Decision Date (Nhs Continuing Healthcare Standard) - Description

div.p: A Clinical Commissioning Group Eligibility Decision Date (NHS Continuing Healthcare Standard) is an ACTIVITY DATE TIME.

The Clinical Commissioning Group Eligibility Decision Date (NHS Continuing Healthcare Standard) is the date the Clinical Commissioning Group reached an eligibility decision for NHS Continuing Healthcare (Standard).
